themes.title: Cyberpunk
themes.desc: In a gritty, dystopian future where technology and corporate power reign supreme, you navigate the seedy underworld while fighting against oppressive societal structures.

themes.title: Post-Apocalypse
themes.desc: In a barren and desolate wasteland ravaged by the aftermath of a catastrophic event, you struggle to rebuild and survive amidst the ruins of civilization.

themes.title: Medieval Fantasy
themes.desc: In a world of magic, mythical creatures, and feudal kingdoms, you embark on a quest to save the realm from a looming evil threat.
